Package ca.cmput301t05.placeholder.qrcode

Class QRCode

java.lang.Object
ca.cmput301t05.placeholder.qrcode.QRCode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class QRCode extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a QR Code for an event, encapsulating the event ID and the type of QR code. The QR code can be of two types: infoQR (true) for event information or checkInQR (false) for event check-in. This class utilizes the ZXing ("Zebra Crossing") library for encoding the event's ID and type into a QR code.
See Also:

    QRCode(Event event, String type)
    Constructs a QRCode object and encodes it with the eventID of the event that it's for, along with the specified type ("eventInfo" for an info QR code, otherwise a check-in QR code).

  • Constructor Details

    • QRCode

      public QRCode(Event event, String type)
      Constructs a QRCode object and encodes it with the eventID of the event that it's for, along with the specified type ("eventInfo" for an info QR code, otherwise a check-in QR code).
      Parameters:
      event - The event for which the QR code is generated.
      type - The type of QR code: "eventInfo" for an info QR code, any other value for a check-in QR code.

  • Method Details

      public QRCodeType getType()
      Gets the type of the QR code.
      Returns:
      Boolean indicating the type of QR code: true for infoQR, false for checkInQR.
